message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice.  I'm feeling generous, but let's wrap this up.
Come on Bob, you're losing value each round. This is a good deal!
This is it, Alice. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this. Take it or leave it.
You're losing a lot of value, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or we'll be here forever!
